characterDescription:
The trapper is a man with a writ from the local highlord to catch mink on his lands.
He tells Kaladin that he followed the Parshendi who attacked his village a half a day out. Further, that they never deviated from heading straight toward Kholinar. When Kaladin then tells him that that's where he's going as well, the trapper asks Kaladin if he wants him to lead him. Drawing in Stormlight, Kaladin tells the trapper that he's afraid the man would just slow him down.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a scraggly man in leathers, with a bow on his back.
